title: Machan Meesai Lyrics Dhill
stanzas:
Machan meesai veecharuvaa
machini ellaam yengiduvaa
machan kannu mandhirama
suthi ponen pambarama

seikooli sethaaram
ellaam adhu illama
bramman thaan senju
vachaaru ada ellaame

railu naan chikku
bukku railu
nee modha vandhaa
mailu naan enna aaveno

mayilu naan
marudha mala mayilu
nee machili pattnam
puyalu naan
aadippoveno..

Sela oru mundhi vacha
sela oru muthu mani
maala nee vaangi
thaariyaa.

aala oru sengarumbu aala
oru malliga poonjola
adha ezhuthi thariyaa

kizhakkaala maerkkaala
nellu velanja oru kolla
thangavala thaevayila
vairathodu paravaala

ye kapadi kapadi
naan aadi paarkka ready
naan sonnadhu
vaangithaa.

Machan meesai veecharuvaa
machini ellaam yengiduvaa
machan kannu mandhirama
suthi ponen pambarama

seikooli sethaaram
ellaam adhu illama
bramman thaan senju
vachaaru ada ellaame
